org.spongepowered.api.service.scheduler

Interface Scheduler


  • public interface Scheduler
    The base scheduler that schedules tasks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<Task> getScheduledTasks()
      Returns a collection of all currently scheduled tasks.
      java.util.Collection<Task> getScheduledTasks(java.lang.Object plugin)
      Returns a collection of all currently scheduled tasks owned by a certain plugin.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<Task> getTaskById(java.util.UUID id)
      Retrieves a scheduled or running task by its unique ID.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<Task> runRepeatingTask(java.lang.Object plugin, java.lang.Runnable task, long interval)
      Runs the task immediately, then repeats at an interval.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<Task> runRepeatingTaskAfter(java.lang.Object plugin, java.lang.Runnable task, long interval, long delay)
      Runs the task after a delay in ticks, then repeats at an interval.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<Task> runTask(java.lang.Object plugin, java.lang.Runnable task)
      Runs the task immediately.
      com.google.common.base.Optional<Task> runTaskAfter(java.lang.Object plugin, java.lang.Runnable task, long delay)
      Runs the task after a delay in ticks.

    • Method Detail

      • runTask

        com.google.common.base.Optional<Task> runTask(java.lang.Object plugin,
                                              java.lang.Runnable task)
        Runs the task immediately.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin requesting the task
        task - The task to run
        Returns:
        The scheduled task, if successful

      • runTaskAfter

        com.google.common.base.Optional<Task> runTaskAfter(java.lang.Object plugin,
                                                   java.lang.Runnable task,
                                                   long delay)
        Runs the task after a delay in ticks.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin requesting the task
        task - The task to run
        delay - The delay in ticks
        Returns:
        The scheduled task, if successful

      • runRepeatingTask

        com.google.common.base.Optional<Task> runRepeatingTask(java.lang.Object plugin,
                                                       java.lang.Runnable task,
                                                       long interval)
        Runs the task immediately, then repeats at an interval.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin requesting the task
        task - The task to run
        interval - The interval between runs (in ticks)
        Returns:
        The scheduled task, if successful

      • runRepeatingTaskAfter

        com.google.common.base.Optional<Task> runRepeatingTaskAfter(java.lang.Object plugin,
                                                            java.lang.Runnable task,
                                                            long interval,
                                                            long delay)
        Runs the task after a delay in ticks, then repeats at an interval.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin requesting the task
        task - The task to run
        interval - The interval between runs (in ticks)
        delay - The delay in ticks
        Returns:
        The scheduled task, if successful

      • getTaskById

        com.google.common.base.Optional<Task> getTaskById(java.util.UUID id)
        Retrieves a scheduled or running task by its unique ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the task
        Returns:
        The scheduled or running task, or Optional.absent()

      • getScheduledTasks

        java.util.Collection<Task> getScheduledTasks()
        Returns a collection of all currently scheduled tasks.
        Returns:
        A collection of scheduled tasks

      • getScheduledTasks

        java.util.Collection<Task> getScheduledTasks(java.lang.Object plugin)
        Returns a collection of all currently scheduled tasks owned by a certain plugin.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin to return tasks created by
        Returns:
        A collection of scheduled tasks
